item.title: Azure AD Connect No-Start-Connection
item.description: This morning, I ran into an issue with Azure AD Connect that I had never seen before. I received an email alert from Azure AD stating that Password Synchronization was not working for my forest, and the suggested fix was to restart the ADSync service on the server. I restarted the service and then forced a sync to verify it was working. After forcing the sync, I opened miisclient and noticed some strange errors.
